Welcome to HarmonyJS documentation website. HarmonyJS is a simple yet complete NodeJS framework
for building next-generation websites and applications.

HarmonyJS is a data-first, reactive framework primarily aimed at large and scalable applications.
It relies on established as well as state-of-the-art technologies such as changestreams, websockets and GraphQL
to provide amazing performances and an awesome developer experience.

All parts of HarmonyJS are built with stateless-ness in mind, inspired by GraphQL resolvers which are a big part of
the core framework. Because of this stateless philosophy, Harmony applications are scalable horizontally out-of-the-box.
